player_information.key_achievements: 2024 Pro Bowl selection, set Browns single season record with 90 receptions in 2024, recorded career highs for receptions (90) and receiving yards (1,229) with four touchdowns in his first season with Cleveland, finished sixth in the NFL in receiving yards, won the 2018 Fred Biletnikoff Award as the nation's best wide receiver, named consensus first-team All-American and first-team All-SEC at Alabama
player_information.performance_goals: becoming even more productive in his second year with the Browns and helping the team win more games

team_information.team_strategy: providing QB with another threat in the pass game to help take pressure off of other receivers and stretch opposing defenses
team_information.team_success: scored the fewest points in the league in 2024

contract_financial_details.performance_metrics: 90 receptions and 1,229 receiving yards – the sixth-most in the NFL – and added four touchdowns

agent_information.total_contracts_value: $58 million contract extension with $41 million guaranteed

coaching_management.coaching_experience: Head coach Kevin Stefanski who praised Jeudy and noted his good understanding of the system and scheme
coaching_management.player_coach_relationship: 1 year (2024 was his first season with Browns)
coaching_management.gm_experience: Executive Vice President of Football Operations and General Manager Andrew Berry
